statements: UPDATE email_segments SET segment_name = 'New Segment Name' WHERE segment_id = 1;
UPDATE email_segments SET engagement_metrics = '{"open_rate": 20, "click_rate": 10}' WHERE segment_id = 2;
UPDATE email_segments SET segment_name = 'New Segment Name', demographic_criteria = '{
email_opened_count
click_through_rate
: 0.05}' WHERE segment_id = 1;
UPDATE email_segments SET engagement_metrics = '{
total_emails_sent
open_rate
click_rate
: 0.1}' WHERE segment_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', age = 30 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_engagement SET engagement_score = 80, last_login = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', newsletter_subscription = TRUE WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com', age = 30 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_engagement SET last_login = NOW(), engagement_score = engagement_score + 10 WHERE user_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174012';
UPDATE users SET age = 25, engagement_score = 80 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE demographics SET income = 75000, job_title = 'Software Engineer' WHERE user_id = 54321;

UPDATE promotions SET promo_date='2022-08-15', redeemed=true WHERE promo_id=1001;
